component.name: Gmail Cleaner
component.summary: Intelligent Gmail organization with AI-powered categorization

description.p: Gmail Cleaner is a powerful email management tool that uses LM Studio AI integration to intelligently categorize and organize your Gmail inbox. Features include:

ul.li: Smart email categorization using local AI models
Modern QML interface with Material Design
Real-time processing with live progress monitoring
Comprehensive audit logging and undo functionality
Bulk email processing for large inboxes
